# Tamar Shmueli Law Office & Notary

> Premium legal services firm based in Haifa, Israel. Specializing in real estate law, real estate taxation, wills & inheritance, power of attorney, family law, and notary services.

## About

Tamar Shmueli Law Office & Notary (משרד עו"ד ונוטריון תמר שמואלי) is a boutique law firm led by Adv. & Notary Tamar Shmueli, with over 30 years of legal experience. The firm provides comprehensive legal services with a personal approach, serving clients in Haifa, the Krayot area, and throughout Israel.

### Team
- **Adv. & Notary Tamar Shmueli** — Founder & Owner. Member of the Israel Bar Association since 1999. Specializes in real estate taxation, complex real estate transactions, wills, continuing power of attorney, and digital notary services.
- **Adv. Jomana Ouda** — Associate Attorney. Experienced in real estate and real estate taxation. Provides personal and professional accompaniment in complex transactions.

## Services

- Real Estate Transactions (עסקאות נדל"ן)
- Real Estate Taxation & Tax Planning (מיסוי מקרקעין ותכנון מס)
- Wills & Inheritance (צוואה וירושה)
- Continuing Power of Attorney (ייפוי כוח מתמשך)
- TAMA 38 & Urban Renewal (תמ"א 38 והתחדשות עירונית)
- Digital Notary & Document Authentication (נוטריון דיגיטלי ואימות מסמכים)
- Prenuptial Agreements (הסכמי ממון)
- Purchase from Contractor (קניית דירה מקבלן)
- Lease Agreements (הסכמי שכירות)
